name: Galaxia Conquestum
description:
Galaxia Conquestum is a turn-base/arcade game. Select your faction and enter the galaxy map to strategically choose your galaxy to conquer. Then fight in a space arcade scrolling shooter to conquer that galaxy! Be careful, your opponent(s) can also attack you! Defend your galaxy when attacked and bring the fight to your enemy on the next turn!

FEATURES
  • Cross platform saves
  • Custom game settings
  • Choose from three factions
  • Turn based and arcade gameplay
  • All original music
